Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_01>Hmm?<sp:5:0:0> Hold on there. Your shield...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>You've attached a cart. Has anyone even
done that before? Crafting a shield that
way will make it really fast!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You've got the ol' shield-surfing fire in
you, doing things no one's done.<sp:5:0:0> The
future of our sport is bright!
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oooh.<sp:5:0:0> I see you're sporting a
<clr:0000>radiant shield<clr:ffff>!

Yeah, for sure. Shredders consider that
a <clr:0000>ridiculously rare shield<clr:ffff>. If you're gonna
be fearless out there, that's a good one.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Very sturdy. Slides like a dream!
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Nice!<sp:5:0:0> Every surfer recognizes a <clr:0000>shield of
the mind's eye<clr:ffff> when they see one.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>It's really good for sliding—easy to jump
on and get goin' too.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh...<sp:5:0:0> Got yourself a <clr:0000>Gerudo shield<clr:ffff>, huh?
Good shield. Seems pretty sturdy. 

I've heard the Gerudo use these all the
time to slide on sand dunes.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Should be great for us shield surfers
then too.
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Is that shield on your back the one Teach
gave you as thanks for saving her?

Whoa. In the shield-surfing world, there's
talk that it fell from the sky, and that it's
made of a mysterious material.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>From the looks of it, seems harder to
believe that it's nice and solid. But it is.
Easy to slide on too.
Mysterious! But it's a good shield for
those who really want to slide with ease.
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Hmm?<sp:5:0:0> Hang on. That shield...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>It's been modified! Yeah, that's going
to be its own thing out there.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I see...<sp:5:0:0> Less friction. Easier to slide on.
Good choice for a beginner too.
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Oh...<sp:5:0:0> You're rocking the <clr:0000>Daybreaker<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0>
Quite the stylish choice.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Super sturdy. Sophisticated look.
Good at what it does.

Oh yeah, it's an excellent one for
shredding on the slopes.
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Hmm?<sp:5:0:0> Hold on. That shield...<sp:5:1:0> It's been
modified, but...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I gotta say...<sp:5:1:0>I think the change makes it
harder to slide on. The reverse of
what you'd want.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, no one in shield surfing's gonna
tell you not to use that. So, I guess you
can see how it goes out there.
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hey, I know that thing.<sp:5:0:0> Oh yeah. It's a
<clr:0000>steel Lizal shield<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Sturdier than sturdy. That's what it's
really known for.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>That shield won't break easily if you
hit the slopes with it fiercely. Good one
for really shredding like a maniac.
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hmm?<sp:5:0:0> Hold on. That shield...<sp:0:4:0>Looks like it's been modified! <sp:5:1:0>So you
made some tweaks for speed, huh?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Doesn't look like it's any less slick, at
least. You should keep experimenting
until you get it perfect!
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>What, what, whaaat?!<sp:5:0:0> No way.<sp:5:1:0> No!<sp:5:0:0> Way!


That's a real <clr:0000>Hylian shield<clr:ffff>?!<sp:0:4:0>Oh, yeah. A <clr:0000>legendary shield<clr:ffff>. Hey, you
did good, gettin' your hands on that.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>You should be able to slide really fast
with it. Even when you're not on snow.
On sand too—and sand's a beast.
That shield is super sturdy and will take
a lot of damage on the slopes. It won't
break for a long, long time.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You'll enjoy that beauty for sure.
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That a <clr:0000>royal guard's shield <clr:ffff>I see on
your back?

It's not a bad shield. But yeah, maybe
not the best for shield surfing. It's
not sturdy enough to last.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Hmm...<sp:5:0:0> It's just plain too breakable.


<sp:3:0:2:0001>Nope. Can't recommend it to anyone
who's tryin' to get the hang of how to
shield surf.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>OK, here's the straight shot on
shield surfing—the most important thing
is which shield you choose.
So, my man, here's what I'll do for you.
I'll give you shield advice. Consider it
more thanks for rescuing Teach.
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_00>Oh?<sp:5:0:0> Let's see, you're carrying a
<clr:0000>royal shield<clr:ffff>, right?

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Good shield. Handsome design. A fine
balance between sturdiness and its
ability to sliiide.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Might be too refined for a starter shield,
but yeah, good overall.
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Hey, maaan!<sp:5:0:0> You're missin' the most
critical thing. The shield!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You DO know these are pretty sacred
slopes for shield surfers, right? You
can't come in here empty-handed.<sp:5:1:0>
No shield, no surfing. Come back when
you get your hands on a shield.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Always up for shield talk, my man. Count
on me for advice. Got plenty to say!
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hmm...<sp:5:0:0> That shield you're carrying is
pretty decent.

Looks sturdy and seems like it'd slide
pretty OK.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yeah, solid choice in general for anyone
startin' out with shield surfing.
Talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_01>Hmm?<sp:5:0:0> Wait a minute. Your shield...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Whoa. You've attached a sled. Way to
expand what's possible! Crafting a shield
that way will really make it slide.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That's a shield surfer for you—stayin'
flexible. Yeah, forget the old ways of
doing things if you need to!
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Can't believe anyone would come to
these most sacred slopes for shield
surfers...<sp:5:0:0>without a shield.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're itchin' to hit the slopes, my
man, come back after you get your
hands on a shield.
